eventSummary:
Fintech firm Figure Technologies suffered a data breach involving the exposure of personal customer details. The incident was attributed to a social-engineering phishing attack targeting an employee, and the data was reportedly leaked by ShinyHunters hackers after the company refused to pay a ransom.
